epigramma: From Concept to Couture: Crafting Your Dream Wedding Dress

noCollection.title: Exclusive Designs,
noCollection.description: We delve into your dreams and listen to your story. Every detail is customized to reflect your unique personality. Our creativity knows no bounds, and we work with passion to ensure your dress is a perfect expression of you.

firstStep.title: Initial Consultation:
firstStep.description: In this first meeting, you’ll share your ideas and the styles you feel most comfortable in. We provide a comprehensive consultation about your silhouette and the best materials to use, considering the location and overall theme of your wedding.

faq1.question: Where are you based?
faq1.answer: Our Atelier is in Monza, just outside Milan. We can also arrange an initial video call (we speak Italian, French, and English).

faq2.question: Can I try on dresses?
faq2.answer: Absolutely! We have prototypes to help you explore ideas, feel materials, and find what suits you best.

faq3.question: Not convinced after the meeting?
faq3.answer: No worries. We enjoyed meeting you, sharing an 'aperitivo', and offering some valuable insights.

faq4.question: Ready to proceed?
faq4.answer: We’re thrilled to embark on this journey together! We’ll start sharing sketches, drafts, and proposals to create your dress.

secondStep.title: Try the canvas,
secondStep.description: Your Vision Takes Shape. After a few weeks, you’ll try on the first prototype, reflecting the shapes, measurements, and ideas we’ve discussed. Together, we’ll finalize every detail: fabric, embroidery, accessories, and more.

faq1.question: Want to add or change elements?
faq1.answer: Everything can be modified to meet your desires. Your dress will have everything you envision.

faq2.question: Can I have a hand-painted Italian silk dress?

faq3.question: Can I have custom French haute couture lace?

faq4.question: Can I include bespoke hand embroidery?
faq4.answer: Of course! Your dress will be a true handcrafted, made-to-measure, Made-in-Italy masterpiece.

faq1.question: How long until I receive my dress?
faq1.answer: Typically, 3 months. For special requests or last-minute changes, it may take a few additional weeks.

faq2.question: What if the cost exceeds my budget?
faq2.answer: We understand that dreams sometimes face financial constraints. We’re here to guide you, offering viable alternatives without compromising your vision.

faq3.question: What is the approximate cost?
faq3.answer: It varies based on materials, fabrics, accessories, and techniques. Most of our clients spend between €5,000 and €7,000.

description.line1: Celine has 20 years of experience in the world of fashion, Haute Couture, and Pret à Porter, having worked in Paris and Milan.
description.line2: Throughout her career, she has had the privilege of collaborating with great artists, dressing international celebrities for special events, and preparing shows for Haute Couture.
description.line3: Together with her partner Michele, Celine decided to share her wealth of experience and expertise with those who dream of their own bespoke dress. They offer a Haute Couture service for women who have always envisioned and desired a unique, handcrafted, and tailored creation.
description.line4: If you’ve always wanted your own exclusive dress, visit the atelier and discuss your vision with Celine and Michele to bring your dream to life.
